amendment.description: To provide that certain funds be available for the development of educational activities in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics related to the civilian space program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3309 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3309 proposed by Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S12844; text: CR S12844) To provide that certain funds be available for the development of educational activities in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics related to the civilian space program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3309 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3309 proposed by Senator Mikulski.
